name: Stack Up Tower With Blocks FREE
name_original: Stack Up Tower With Blocks FREE
description:
Stack up the wooden crates and barrels to build a great tower. Play the ALL mode to stack as much as you can or the 15/30 mode to stack 15 or 30 pieces.

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.

Features:
-Mode One: Stack as much as you can
-Mode Two: Stack 15 Blocks
-Mode Three: Stack 30 Blocks
-Very addictive
-Suitable for all ages
-Easy to learn - release the block at the right time
-Fun sounds and music

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
